plugin.name: multi-tenant-acegi
plugin.author: Eric Martineau
plugin.title: Multi-Tenant Acegi Integration
plugin.description:
\ Integrates the multi-tenant plugin with acegi, so the current tenant can be determined from the authenticated principal.
Provides a custom CurrentTenant implementation that uses the security context to identify the current tenant. This allows all users to login from one url instead of having to remember a special url to log in to
